message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
Alice, $200 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $80. Let me know if you're willing to work with me.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $180.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $180 is still a bit too high for me. How about we settle on $100? I'm ready to finalize the deal at that price.
I'm not willing to go as low as $100, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $160.
